name: Provencal Shrimp Saute
keywords: capers, garlic, olive oil, parsley, shrimp, slivered almonds, tomato, low calorie, low-fat, main course
recipeIngredient: 1/4 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large, heavy-bottomed nonstick skillet over medium heat until hot. Add the olive oil. Add the shrimp and saute 1 1/2 minutes. Add the almonds and garlic and saute until the shrimp are cooked. Stir in the capers, tomatoes and parsley. Cook for 1 minute. Stir in the salt and pepper to taste. Divide among 4 plates and serve immediately.
